column4: I'm using 3 monitors with Xinemara, And when I move windows, I'm getting 40-70% CPU usage from Xorg on a 3GHz C2D E6600 - is that normal?
I'm using 3 monitors with Xinemara, And when I move windows, I'm getting 40-70% CPU usage from Xorg on a 3GHz C2D E6600 - is that normal?
40 to 70 dosent surprise me on that
Hm... That's not too great. Is there anything that'll be less intensive (as that's resource hungry, considering this is high-end kit) for tripple monitors
